name: dotNET DLL Loaded Via Office Applications
description: Detects any assembly DLL being loaded by an Office Product
false_positives: Alerts on legitimate macro usage as well, will need to filter as appropriate
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:(*\\winword.exe OR *\\powerpnt.exe OR *\\excel.exe OR *\\outlook.exe) AND file.path:C\:\\Windows\\assembly\\*)`
